name: BLOB BLOOD
description:
SEVERAL STRAINS OF A HORRIBLE MIND CONTROL VIRUS HAVE BROKEN OUT, TRANSFORMING INNOCENT CREATURES INTO FREAKISHLY COLOURED MONSTERS.

THE VIRUS IS TRANSMITTED THROUGH CONTACT WITH AN INFECTED CREATURE'S BLOOD. ONCE INFECTED, THE NEW VICTIM IS A SLAVE TO THE VIRUS'S WILL, BECOMING RABID AND VOMITING BLOOD.

THESE UNRELENTING VIRUSES SEEK TO INFECT AS MANY VICTIMS AS POSSIBLE, EVEN THOSE ALREADY INFECTED BY RIVAL STRAINS.

EVERY DAY THEY MUTATE, GROWING STRONGER.

THERE IS NO CURE.

This game requires 2 to 4 controllers to play.

Created for Global Game Jam 2018. Art and programming by Marcel Flannigan,
